01011         else if (f1<0 && f2<=0) type = 1;

00875                 G4double sinPhi = sin(phi_in);
00876                 G4double sinTheta = sin(theta_helix);
00877                 G4double cosTheta = cos(theta_helix);
00878                 G4double A = x0- cosPhi;
00879                 G4double B = y0- sinPhi*cosTheta - k*phi_in*sinTheta;
00880                 G4double a[6];
00881                 a[0] = B*k*sinTheta;
00882                 a[1] = -sinTheta*sinTheta/2;
00883                 a[2] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta-A;
00884                 a[3] = B;
00885                 a[4] = k*sinTheta*cosTheta;
00886                 a[5] = k*k*sinTheta*sinTheta;
00887                 G4double phi_left, phi_right;
00888                 if ( traveled_dphi > 0 ){
00889                         phi_left = phi_in;
00890                         phi_right = phi_out;
00891                 }
00892                 else{
00893                         phi_left = phi_out;
00894                         phi_right = phi_in;
00895                 }
00896 
00897                 //=>Step 5, find phi
00898                 //About type:
00899                 //0: f'>=0 && f''<0;
00900                 //1: f'<0 && f''<=0;
00901                 //2: f'<0 && f''>=0;
00902                 //3: f'>=0 && f''>0;
00904                 //ATTENTION!!! This method will fail if there are more than 4 segments(devided according to types) in this step
00905                 int type_left = check_type(a,phi_left);
00906                 int type_right = check_type(a,phi_right);
00907                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00908                         std::cout<<"    type_left = "<<type_left<<", type_right == "<<type_right<<std::endl;
00909                 }
00910                 G4int nTry_max = 100;
00911                 double error = 0;
00912                 G4double root_left = NewtonRootFinding(a,phi_left,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00913                 if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00914                 G4double root_right = NewtonRootFinding(a,phi_right,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00915                 if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00916                 G4double b[4];
00917                 b[0] = theta_helix;
00918                 b[1] = k;
00919                 b[2] = A;
00920                 b[3] = B;
00921                 G4double dist2_left = calculateDist2(b,phi_left);
00922                 G4double dist2_right = calculateDist2(b,phi_right);
00923                 G4double phi;
00924                 if ( (type_left == type_right && type_right <= 1 && root_left != root_right) || (type_left == 1 && type_right == 0) ){
00925                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00926                                 std::cout<<"    =>Need to find minimum value"<<std::endl;
00927                         }
00928                         //half finding
00929                         G4double left = root_left;
00930                         G4double right = root_right;
00931                         G4double mid;
00932                         int iTry = 0;
00933                         while (1){
00934                                 mid = ( left + right )/2;
00935                                 int type = check_type(a,mid);
00936                                 if ( type == 1 || type == 2 ) break;
00937                                 else if (type == 0) right = mid;
00938                                 else left = mid;
00939                                 if ( iTry++ >= nTry_max ){
00940                                         //std::cout<<"WARNING: in CdcSD::FindClosestPoint(), iTry reached maximum limit "<<iTry<<std::endl;
00941                                         break;
00942                                 }
00943                         }
00944                         if (nTry<iTry) nTry = iTry;
00945                         G4double root_mid = NewtonRootFinding(a,mid,nTry_max,fTolerance,error);
00946                         if (error_max<fabs(error)) error_max = fabs(error);
00947                         G4double dist2_root = calculateDist2(b,root_mid);
00948                         int index = findSmallest(dist2_left, dist2_right, dist2_root);
00949                         if ( index == 0 ) phi = phi_left;
00950                         else if ( index == 1 ) phi = phi_right;
00951                         else phi = root_mid;
00952                 }
00953                 else if( (type_left <= 2 && type_right == 3) ||
00954                                 (type_left == type_right && type_right == 2 && root_left != root_right) ||
00955                                 (type_left == type_right && type_right == 3 && root_left != root_right) ||
00956                                 (type_left == 2 && type_right <= 1) ){
00957                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00958                                 std::cout<<"    =>Got minimum value"<<std::endl;
00959                         }
00960                         G4double dist2_root = calculateDist2(b,root_right);
00961                         int index = findSmallest(dist2_left, dist2_right, dist2_root);
00962                         if ( index == 0 ) phi = phi_left;
00963                         else if ( index == 1 ) phi = phi_right;
00964                         else phi = root_right;
00965                 }
00966                 else {
00967                         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00968                                 std::cout<<"    =>Don't need minimum value"<<std::endl;
00969                         }
00970                         phi = (dist2_left < dist2_right ? phi_left : phi_right);
00971                 }
00972 
00973                 //=>Step 6, get the point
00974                 G4double X = r_helix * ( cos(phi) + A );
00975                 G4double Y = r_helix * ( sin(phi)*cosTheta + k*phi*sinTheta + B );
00976                 G4double Z = r_helix * ( k*phi*cosTheta - sin(phi)*sinTheta - k*phi_in*cosTheta + z0 + sinPhi*sinTheta );
00977                 closestPoint_pos.setX(X);
00978                 closestPoint_pos.setY(Y);
00979                 closestPoint_pos.setZ(Z);
00980 
00981                 //=>Step 7, transform it back to lab coordinate system
00982                 driftD = closestPoint_pos.rho();
00983                 closestPoint_pos += vec4move;
00984                 closestPoint_pos.rotate(z_axis, -theta4rotate_y);
00985                 closestPoint_pos.rotate(axis4rotate_z, -theta4rotate_z);
00986 
00987                 if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00988                         std::cout<<"    traveled_dphi = "<<traveled_dphi/deg
00989                                 <<"deg, phi_in = "<<phi_in/deg
00990                                 <<"deg, phi_out = "<<phi_out/deg
00991                                 <<"deg, phi = "<<phi/deg
00992                                 <<"deg"<<std::endl;
00993                 }
00994         }
00995         if ( get_VerboseLevel() >= 5 ){
00996                 std::cout<<"  closestPoint_pos(rho,phi,z):"<<closestPoint_pos.rho()/cm<<"cm, "<<closestPoint_pos.phi()/deg<<"deg, "<<closestPoint_pos.z()/cm<<"cm, driftD = "<<driftD/cm<<"cm"<<std::endl;
00997         }
00998         return 0;
00999 }
